sentences.sentence: Party B causes great loss to Party A due to its breach of duty and jobbery.
sentences.translation: 乙方严重失职，营私舞弊，给甲方利益造成重大损失。

sentences.sentence: He was inexperienced in stock jobbery and got his fingers burned in the stock market.
sentences.translation: 他对股票买卖缺乏经验，在股票市场上吃了亏。

sentences.sentence: Party yB has serious neglect of duty, jobbery or leak out of important business information;
sentences.translation: 乙方严重失职、营私舞弊、泄露重要商业信息；
